ProductInfo.Features:
M-JEPG Video Compression; 1/4" CMOS 300,000 pixel; IR Distance: 10M
Built in Microphone. listen to it everywhere, the most practical intercom function
Support snapshot and record on alarming; App for iPhone, Android, Windows etc
Built-in DDNS system, dedicated domain name bounded, make it convenient for users to visit
Support dynamic IP address, no worry IP change and frequently offline problems
Support WiFi, IEEE802.11 b/g/n
Support pan/tilt control (pan:355˚ & tilt:120˚). Cruise automatically
Built-in IR-Cut filter, no color cast, better picture viewing quality
ActiveX certified by Microsoft, no worry to be invaded by virus
ProductInfo.Name: GW Wifi Pan/Tilt Indoor Security IR Wireless IP Camera with Built-in Microphone - 1/4" CMOS 300,000 Pixel (Very Easy to Install)
